trans-unit.source: Indicates to XAML processors that the whitespace surrounding elements of the type in markup should be trimmed when serializing.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化時，向 XAML 處理器表示應該修剪標記中類型項目周圍的空白。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is applied to specific types that might appear as child elements within whitespace significant content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會套用至特定的類型，可能會顯示為空白字元重要內容中的子項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 中的空白字元處理](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.TrimSurroundingWhitespaceAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。
